/config.description: Choose a Share for Duplicati configuration. Eg: create a Share called duplicati-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

PGID.description: Group ID of the owner of the source data directory
PGID.label: PGID

PUID.description: User ID of the owner of the source data directory

Duplicati2-beta.description: Duplicati is a backup client that securely stores encrypted, incremental, compressed backups on cloud storage services and remote file servers.
